title: Anger in Uganda over a rise in kidnappings
text:
Anger in Uganda over a rise in kidnappings 9:15am BST - 01:54 
Public anger is increasing in Uganda over a rise in kidnappings, with the police accused of serving the interests of President Yoweri Museveni over solving crimes.   
Public anger is increasing in Uganda over a rise in kidnappings, with the police accused of serving the interests of President Yoweri Museveni over solving crimes.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/04/19/anger-in-uganda-over-a-rise-in-kidnappin?videoId=419158109&videoChannel=13422
